00001 #include <ip.h>
00002 
00003 void
00004 ip_packet_drop(ip_state * state, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00005 {
00006         tw_event        *e;
00007 
00008         state->stats->s_ndropped++;
00009 
00010         if(msg->src == lp->id)
00011                 state->stats->s_ndropped_source++;
00012 
00013 #if VERIFY_IP
00014         printf("%lld: dropped src %lld, dst %lld on port %d \n", 
00015                 lp->id, msg->src, msg->dst, msg->port);
00016 #endif
00017 
00018         // Need to free the event otherwise it will simply be lost!
00019         e = rn_event_new(msg->dst, 0.0, lp, DOWNSTREAM, msg->size);
00020 
00021         if(e == lp->pe->abort_event)
00022                 tw_event_free(lp->pe, e);
00023 }
00024 
00025 void
00026 ip_rc_packet_drop(ip_state * state, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00027 {
00028         state->stats->s_ndropped--;
00029 
00030         if(msg->src == lp->id)
00031                 state->stats->s_ndropped_source--;
00032 }
